Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api

@Version("1.0.1") package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api
Interfaces for usage of the Rhyme framework in an OSGI R7 container
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer
    A service that asynchronously renders a LinkableResource to a JAX-RS AsyncResponse, and handles any errors that happen during rendering
    JaxRsBundleInfo
    Provides information about the OSGi bundle version and the base-path of the Application contained in the bundle
    JaxRsLinkBuilder<T>
